markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Nudge Fate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1890)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 387 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Patron Theme**
[Spinner of Threads](/Patrons.aspx?ID=16)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The barest spin of your patron's spool is enough to alter fate. When the target fails an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw and a +1 status bonus would turn a critical failure into a failure, or failure into a success, you grant the target a +1 status bonus to the check retroactively, changing the outcome appropriately. The spell then ends.

 If you cast _nudge fate_ while a previous casting of this hex is still in effect, the previous effect ends.
name: Nudge Fate

summary_markdown: The barest spin of your patron's spool is enough to alter fate.
text: Nudge Fate Single Action Source Player Core pg. 387 2.0 Patron Theme Spinner of Threads Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Duration 1 minute --- The barest spin of your patron's spool is enough to alter fate. When the target fails an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw and a +1 status bonus would turn a critical failure into a failure, or failure into a success, you grant the target a +1 status bonus to the check retroactively, changing the outcome appropriately. The spell then ends. If you cast nudge fate while a previous casting of this hex is still in effect, the previous effect ends.
